title: $extract
description: Extracts one or more named properties from a hash into a new hash

return.description: A new hash with the requested properties; if `from` is an array, the result is an array of properties extracted from each item of `from`. Use `$pick` to extract a single property.

props.description: The names of the properties to extract

oneOf.description: The object from where to extract the data
An array of object from where to extract the data

default.description: A has of default values to use when one or more requested properties cannot be found
